meta.description: A development tool to help programmers write Java code that adheres to a coding standard. By default it supports the Sun Code Conventions, but is highly configurable.
meta.name: checkstyle

meta.description: Checks Java source against a coding standard

license.fullName: GNU Library General Public License v2.1 only

meta.long_description:
checkstyle is a development tool to help programmers write Java code that
adheres to a coding standard. By default it supports the Sun Code
Conventions, but is highly configurable.
